column4: Hi there, ive got a program called exaile, and im trying to play an mp3, and it keeps saying: You do not have the appropriate Gstreamer plugin installed to play this file     any ideas please?
I suggest you install mplayer/gmplayer which supports many other formats
but its only a .mp3.. how come it wont play that? and ikonia  i dunno, i just installed the program itself
